command.source: SELECT PMCY_NB , PMCY_NME, PMCY_TYPE_CD, PMCY_CHN_AFIL_CD , PMCY_ST_ADDR , PMCY_CITY_NME , PMCY_ST_CD , PMCY_ZIP_CD, PMCY_SUFX_ZIP_CD, MSA_NB , PMCY_PEAR_SCOR_VL, PMCY_PHON_NB , PMCY_MBR_CD , PMCY_TERM_DT, PMCY_PO_BOX_NB , UPDT_LGN_ID_NB , UPDT_TS, CHG_DT, CNTY_NME , PMCY_TERM_PMRC_CD , PMCY_RA_FILE_ID , PMCY_RA_PRNT_CD , RXCLM_PEAR_SCOR_VL, COMB_PEAR_SCOR_VL, MSTR_CHN_CD, SRX_CD, STOR_NB , PMCY_PHON_EXTN_NB, INTNL_OWN_PMCY_CD , SBSD_PMCY_CD , MLOR_CD , NOTE_ID , MEDD_DSPR_TYP_CD , QL_PEAR_SCOR_VL FROM ${pmt_schema}.pcyn004 ORDER BY 1,4
command.target: INSERT INTO ${dmt_schema}.pcyn004 (PMCY_NB , PMCY_NME, PMCY_TYPE_CD, PMCY_CHN_AFIL_CD , PMCY_ST_ADDR , PMCY_CITY_NME , PMCY_ST_CD , PMCY_ZIP_CD, PMCY_SUFX_ZIP_CD, MSA_NB , PMCY_PEAR_SCOR_VL, PMCY_PHON_NB , PMCY_MBR_CD , PMCY_TERM_DT, PMCY_PO_BOX_NB , UPDT_LGN_ID_NB , UPDT_TS, CHG_DT, CNTY_NME , PMCY_TERM_PMRC_CD , PMCY_RA_FILE_ID , PMCY_RA_PRNT_CD , RXCLM_PEAR_SCOR_VL, COMB_PEAR_SCOR_VL, MSTR_CHN_CD, SRX_CD, STOR_NB , PMCY_PHON_EXTN_NB, INTNL_OWN_PMCY_CD , SBSD_PMCY_CD , MLOR_CD , NOTE_ID , MEDD_DSPR_TYP_CD , QL_PEAR_SCOR_VL ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )

catch.command:
